descriptionHtml:
Simple Elven armor male/female Retexures

Description;

Wasn\'t pleased with the vanilla elven armor texture and i cannot mod very well so I found two nice retextures on nexus to replace it, one for a female version of the elven armor which is from \"Iron Elven Armor for Male And Females\" by Sabor (my mod has that mods female chest plate texture only) and the male elven armor has the \"Elven Armor Retexture\" by Elefish which is only a male retexture; there both silver/iron like base colors where only the male version has green guilds (see pics)......i like the way it distinguishes between male and female sort of showing a class/ranking hierarchy in the elven military, all this mod does is merge parts of two different mods into one compact mod, 

ALL CREDIT GOES TO THE FOLLOWING ORIGINAL MODS;

-\"Iron Elven Armor for Male And Females\" by Sabor 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=484

-\"Elven Armor Retexture\" by Elefish
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4820

this mod replaces;
elven armors (different for both male and female)
elven guantlets (same for both male and female)
elven boots (same for both male and female)
elven helmet (same for both male and female)

Installation (Manual): 
- Download the main file 
- Open the main archive and move the textures, to Skyrim data directory. (These are all the files required)(just follow the file path)
 c;\\program files\\the elder scrolls v skyrim\\data

Uninstallation (Manual):
- Remove the textures, 

I did not make any of these retextures; what i did was edit their file path locations so that they only replace the files i want for to suit my opinion they suit; subsequently this will also change any npc that has elven armor which makes them look better--see pics. 

Have not had any bugs/issues but if there are comment, i am new to modding so dont expect miracle fixes.

Comment, endorse its all good, All THANKS GOES TO Sabor and Elefish 

You may use this mod so long as you mention it origins and creators. 

My other lore friendly mods;

Thieves Guild Regular Armor Retextures 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6407

Simpler Jewel Craft pack and ideal changes 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6188

Simpler Dragonbone Weapons Pack 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6027

Simple Nordhero Universal Quiver replacer 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6595

Recommendations;
Pants for leather armor (looks better) see Dude wheres my pants - Leather Armor by Nivea
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5027
author: davnat and Sabor and Elefish
